figure out a strategy, eventually got 2048. Thanks due to the Dev.

but I didn't. It is so addicting and challenging! Love it!

Great puzzle game, and I like the endless mode after reaching 2048. So far, I've got a 8192 and 2048 tiles, and I'm still going. My current score is nearly at 120,000 and it's great that I can close the app, then pick it up and carry on later.  Best thing though is its free, no ads and no permission...Full ReviewGreat puzzle game, and I like the endless mode after reaching 2048. So far, I've got a 8192 and 2048 tiles, and I'm still going. My current score is nearly at 120,000 and it's great that I can close the app, then pick it up and carry on later.  Best thing though is its free, no ads and no permissions. Something that's unheard of nowadays.

Great app, looks great and works as it should. The only problem is that it crashes at least 3 times during any game for me. I'm not even sure it's a crash because I can just go right back on the app without any problems. It just randomly sends me to my home screen. Anyway, my high score is 376,520. ...Full ReviewGreat app, looks great and works as it should. The only problem is that it crashes at least 3 times during any game for me. I'm not even sure it's a crash because I can just go right back on the app without any problems. It just randomly sends me to my home screen. Anyway, my high score is 376,520. That took me a while and a lot of undos

Almost perfect version of the game. The only issue is not very good detection of swipes. Sometimes it just does nothing. Other versions don't have this problem. Maybe it's better to increase sensitivity of the swipe gesture?
Fantastic! No ads, no distractions, just minimalist version of one of my favorite puzzle games. Can't see any reason anyone looking for a basic 2048 game would rate this anything less than 5 stars.

It's a great game no matter how you play it, but this is the best version to download. No ads and no weird permissions that other versions want. Just how it should be - Big kudos to the developer for that alone.
Love this game.  I beat it almost every time I play.  So for me the trick is the highest double.    One thing I wish it has was a timer.  Then I could track and try and beat my personal best time.

Great game, challenging at the highest numbers. Got up to 8192, with high 
score over 163k. Working to get higher
Overall it's a great game with features and benefits as stated by others. I would like it more if the higher value tiles were a different colour. I have just made 8192 but it's black, same as 4096.

This is exactly what this sort of game should be. There is massive community involvement with expanding language localization, no permissions, extremely simple, and open source, AND NO ADS! Love the amazing work. Keep it up.
The best 2048 game because it is smooth, has no ads, requires no purchases, and requires no permissions! My highest score is over 281,000 so far! Very addictive.
The only 2048 worth downloading, the rest have ads which makes no sense for an open source game.

I achieved the perfect score 3890688. All tiles from 131072, 65536, 32768 to 8192 to 64, 32, 16, 8 and 4. I was hoping at the end the game will give me a "8" so that I can actually reach the 262144 tile. Did not happen but still appreciate the smooth controls and good graphics.

I'm addicted. Some games go for days. My current best score is 839934.

I was playing a similar match 4 game for quite a while. I deleted it after I played this game for only a couple hours.  What more could a gamer ask for; a game with ~ no overreaching permissions, nothing to buy, no inane ads for games/products you aren't interested in; just steady, uninterrupted gam...Full ReviewI was playing a similar match 4 game for quite a while. I deleted it after I played this game for only a couple hours.  What more could a gamer ask for; a game with ~ no overreaching permissions, nothing to buy, no inane ads for games/products you aren't interested in; just steady, uninterrupted game play.  I downloaded this app in the wee hours of 7/25/17 ~ next thing I knew, it was after 11:00 am.    Developer, thank you very much for a brain stimulating, addictive puzzle game.

Why isn't this the top rated 2048 game here? The controls and graphics are as expected for this game, it doesn't spy on my location or need weird permissions, and there are no ads. The only improvements I can think of would be graphical effects like adding a glow effect to new or higher number tiles...Full ReviewWhy isn't this the top rated 2048 game here? The controls and graphics are as expected for this game, it doesn't spy on my location or need weird permissions, and there are no ads. The only improvements I can think of would be graphical effects like adding a glow effect to new or higher number tiles like the web one does.

I'm really liking this game. However, the controls are terribly stiff and spoil the fun. I have to swipe two or three times before they actually move. Online versions are much more sensitive and make for faster playing. Could you correct this please?

I have tried several version of this great game. I like the graphics on this one and, of course, the lack of ads. I also like that there is an undo button. My only criticism is that the tiles don't slide as easily as in some other versions - too often a swipe fails to move them, which is frustrating...Full ReviewI have tried several version of this great game. I like the graphics on this one and, of course, the lack of ads. I also like that there is an undo button. My only criticism is that the tiles don't slide as easily as in some other versions - too often a swipe fails to move them, which is frustrating.

Great 2048 game. I love that it's ad free! So few apps out there like this without pushing as many ads at you as you can bear. I'm really thankful that there are developers like this still out there. Thank you so much!
Im just gonna give this app 5 stars without playing because there are no ads.  I see ads on other games that are disgusting! Time to play now. Hopefully I will enjoy it. ‚ò∫
This is exactly what a game should be. No ads, just pure game play. This game sets the standards that other games can only strive for.

My only complaint is that the back button allows you to re roll the spawn location (and value) of the next new tile. Other than that, awesome game!.

I've looked long and hard for the perfect 2048 game and this is it! Gameplay is super smooth and fast. Simple graphics, colors are not aggressive. And of course no ads or in app purchases. Awesome job dev, thank you!!

Novel at first but gets old The game is a lot of fun and a great challenge at first, but after a little while, you figure out how to win and then it just becomes repetitive and a matter of not making two wrong moves in quick succession (since the way to win consistently involves a liberal use of the undo button to get tiles to...Full ReviewThe game is a lot of fun and a great challenge at first, but after a little while, you figure out how to win and then it just becomes repetitive and a matter of not making two wrong moves in quick succession (since the way to win consistently involves a liberal use of the undo button to get tiles to show up where you want them).

Not a math game Just downloaded. Just scored 4676 at first shot before I got bored and defeated myself. Don't know if it's normal, I have been expecting a real math game...anyway enjoyable for wasting some spare time :-)
Great game This game is so much fun. If you never played before just Google how to play and it is pretty easy. It takes up less space on your phone and no ads.
The random 4 that pops up every 4~6 moves make it so you can continue much longer, but even the 4 will block you if you don't have another 4 adjacent to the last open spot.
Works perfectly This is the best 2048. Works well on my Galaxy S6, Tab S 10.5, and another Galaxy S4. UNDO was slow on an earlier version, but that's fixed now. Plus, no ads. Nice work.

No Ads -- But No Sounds, Either No audio, no sound effects (hey, sometimes I like 'em), but the main thing's that it's truly got no ads...open-source, too, which is cool. Also, practically no un-do option -- only one move back is available. I'll probably look for a version I can pay for to have these features, but this one's defin...Full ReviewNo audio, no sound effects (hey, sometimes I like 'em), but the main thing's that it's truly got no ads...open-source, too, which is cool. Also, practically no un-do option -- only one move back is available. I'll probably look for a version I can pay for to have these features, but this one's definitely good enough for something that's truly free!
